name: Facebook Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Facebook events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Facebook Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Facebook events occur

appId.name: appId
appId.natural_language_description: 参数名: APP ID | 作用: Facebook APP ID | (必填项)

whatsappBusinessAccountNotice.displayName: To watch Whatsapp business account events use the Whatsapp trigger node
whatsappBusinessAccountNotice.name: whatsappBusinessAccountNotice
whatsappBusinessAccountNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: To watch Whatsapp business account events use the Whatsapp trigger node

object.name: object
object.natural_language_description: 参数名: Object | 作用: The object to subscribe to | 默认值: user | (必填项)
available_options: Ad Account (值: adAccount) - Get updates about Ad Account
Application (值: application) - Get updates about the app
Certificate Transparency (值: certificateTransparency) - Get updates about Certificate Transparency
Group (值: group) - Get updates about activity in groups and events in groups for Workplace
Instagram (值: instagram) - Get updates about comments on your media
Link (值: link) - Get updates about links for rich previews by an external provider
Permissions (值: permissions) - Updates regarding granting or revoking permissions
Whatsapp Business Account (值: whatsappBusinessAccount) - Get updates about Whatsapp business account
Workplace Security (值: workplaceSecurity) - Get updates about Workplace Security

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The set of fields in this object that are subscribed to. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Field Names or IDs | 作用: The set of fields in this object that are subscribed to. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: []

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: includeValues (值: None) - Whether change notifications should include the new values
